experiences.title: Senior Web Developer
experiences.description: Leading advanced web development projects using cutting-edge technologies. Responsible for architecture decisions and mentoring junior developers.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed scalable web applications using React, Node.js and GraphQL. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and optimized application performance.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Created responsive and accessible user interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated closely with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.description: Worked on various client projects developing websites and web applications. Gained experience with JavaScript, CSS frameworks and version control systems.

experiences.title: Intensive Web Development Course
experiences.description: Completed an intensive 6-month bootcamp focused on web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks and libraries.

experiences.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
experiences.description: Managed digital marketing campaigns and social media presence for various clients. Developed content strategies and analyzed performance metrics.

experiences.title: Store Manager
experiences.description: Oversaw daily operations, managed a team of 10 employees, and ensured excellent customer service. Implemented new sales strategies that increased revenue by 15%.

experiences.title: Team Lead
experiences.description: Led a team of customer service representatives, resolving complex customer issues and training new staff members. Implemented improved customer service protocols.

experiences.title: Sales Associate
experiences.description: First professional experience working as a part-time sales associate while studying. Developed strong interpersonal skills and customer service abilities.

experiences.title: Beginning of Life Journey
experiences.description: Born in 1992, beginning a life journey that would eventually lead to a successful career in web development and technology.
